name: Merged zone reality fracture
prompt: heroic tabletop fantasy (D&D 5e adjacent), grounded medieval-fantasy materials, culturally coherent gear, no modern tech or signage, consistent painterly collection style, Atmospheric scene: Merged zone reality fracture, clear narrative focal point, atmospheric VFX support, cinematic light shaping, high-fidelity illustration, aquatic fantasy realism, subsurface caustics, bioluminescent accents, pressure-dome materials, cinematic atmosphere, palette: teals, deep blues, sea-greens, pearl highlights, Use specified aspect/resolution; avoid artifacts., Avoid readable signage or paragraphs; use iconography or blank signboards. No embedded words., Avoid garbled or random letter strings; keep any symbols meaningful or use numbered pins., Avoid sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, bloom glare.
alt_text: Atmospheric illustration of: Merged zone reality fracture.
revised_prompt: A heroic fantasy scene in the style of tabletop games like Dungeons and Dragons. The materials are grounded in medieval-fantasy, with culturally coherent gear and devoid of modern technological elements. The scene represents a reality fracture, merging different zones, providing a clear focal point in the narrative. Atmospheric visual effects enhance the scene's cinematic look with specifically shaped lights illuminating the high-fidelity illustrated setting. The scene is also inspired by an aquatic fantasy realism with subsurface caustics and bioluminescent accents. Materials akin to pressure-dome structures form part of this underwater fantasy. The color palette is dominated by teals, deep blues, sea-greens, and pearl highlights. The scene should portray an aspect/resolution with no artifacts. The scene is devoid of any readable signage or paragraphs, keeping any symbols meaningful or using numbered pins. The scene avoids any sci-fi UIs, modern signage, photoreal CGI, anime style, and bloom glare.
